Documentation

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Menus

Great to use as a side menu

Food

  • Hamburger
  • Fries

Drinks

  • Smoothie
  • Milkshake
    • Chocolate
    • Vanilla
    • Strawberry
  • Pop
  • Coffee
  • Tea
<aside class="side-menu">
    <p class="menu-label">
        Food
    </p>
    <ul class="menu-list">
        <li><a>Hamburger</a></li>
        <li><a>Fries</a></li>
    </ul>
    <p class="menu-label">
        Drinks
    </p>
    <ul class="menu-list">
        <li><a>Smoothie</a></li>
        <li>
            <a class="active">Milkshake</a>
            <ul>
                <li><a>Chocolate</a></li>
                <li><a>Vanilla</a></li>
                <li><a>Strawberry</a></li>
            </ul>
        </li>
        <li><a>Pop</a></li>
        <li><a>Coffee</a></li>
        <li><a>Tea</a></li>
    </ul>
</aside>
